title: Rosie the Riveter WWII Home Front National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Ranger programs are offered throughout the week. Check the "Things to Do" page for more information. Photo: Ranger Raphael.    Â    Visitor Education Center  Address:  1414 Harbour Way South, Suite 3000 Richmond, CA 94804.  Phone: 510-232-5050 Ext. 0  Hours Of Operation: The Visitor Center is open from 10:00am to 5:00pm, seven days per week, excluding three holidays.   Holidays Closed on Thanksgiving Day (November 26th, 2015), Christmas Day (December 25th, 2015), and New Year's Day (January 1, 2016).   Rosie The Riveter Memorial The Rosie the Riveter Memorial in Marina Bay Park is fully accessible and open year round, dawn to dusk, as are the other Richmond city parks within the National Park's boundries. The park is located at the intersection of Marina Bay Parkway and Melville Square. Please note that Marina Bay Parkway is currently closed, and a detour is available. For more information about the detour, please click on: http://www.moodyup.com/Traffic-Maps.php Park Administrative Offices The park will continue to operate the administrative offices in downtown Richmond. Office hours are Monday to Friday, 9:30am to 4:00pm. Please call in advance if you wish to make an appointment with park staff. The phone number is 510-232-5050 x0.
